TopicTitle: To the Mun and Minmus in 4 days!

Articles.Content:
Hi all!

I play EVE Online and some of my corp mates were chatting about their Kerbal exploits. Well.. I tried the demo after one of them shared a pic of poor Jeb falling to Kerbin in a ball of fire...

I loved it! So I got the real version and have been having a blast for the last 4 days.

I started with orbits, a satellite, 3 failed stations (still having trouble docking. Last try destroyed 2 ships...), and moved to a Mun landing then to Minmus tonight. Jeb's still there. He has the fuel but will leave tomorrow.

I;ve been keeping track of my exploits at http://shadow51585.imgur.com/ so peek if you want.

This game rocks and I cannot wait to see it develop even more!
Welcome to the forums! May your kerbals die a most glorious death!
May you live long and prosper in space.
